satahan kalennnn dinaya: agosthu 08, wasara 2009, senasurada dinayaksith dina pothen blog dina pothata - satahan anka 3daru senehasa.............................nupan wuwath thama kusaye hindina daruwa kere mawakage sitha thula upadinne aparimitha snehayaki.upangeyima daruwekuge wiyowa mawata etharamma wedanakari wanne ebawini.thama garbhani samaye awasan bhagayehi hun mawak thama daruwa dangalima adu bawin rohal gatha wuwaya.mulika waidya parikshanayen anathuruwa hadisi siseriyan shalyakarmayak sidu kirimata thiranaya wiya.ehi nirwindana waidyawaraya wuye mamaya.siyalla kadinamin sidu kala yuthuwa atha.siyalu karyaya mandalaya ee sandaha yuhusulu wiya.ee maranaye dorakadata wi sitina nupan daruwata jiwanayata para kiya dennataya.ek ayekuta hara shalyagaraye siti anek siyallantama kalaya gaman ganu danune widuli wegayeni.kalaya nawathi thibune mawageya.kalaya pamanak nowa mulu lowama nathara wu seyak age muhunin dis wiya.balaporoththuwa ha eya sunweyayi yana chakithayada, sathuta ha dukada, hudakala bawa ha asarana bawada yana wadanin noki sithuwili samuhaya age iriyaw kiya pannata wiya.itha keti kalak thula daruwa sathkamin iwathata ganu labina.siyalu prathikara, prathikarma kerunada eewana witath ohu maranaye dorin athulwi nawatha noennata boho dura gosini.amme...

thripitaka dahama athulu atuwa tika grantha athulu grantha dahasakata aasanna pramanayak saha lowa palawana wishesha ingi්rasi dharma grantha laba ganimatath apa aayathanaya magin mudranaya kala ingashrisi bhashawen rachitha grantha hayasiyayak pamanada me wana wita bauddha sanskruthika madhatyasthanaya magin nikuth kara thibe.jathyanthara pasal arambaima nisa lamayinta awashya ingi්rasi lama grantha rasakda mudranaya kara thibe.lowa wishalathama bauddha poth hala arambaa thibena athara nadimala bauddha sanskruthika madhyasthanayen saha 2600 shri sambuddhathwa jayanthiya nimiththen arambaana lada kolambaa shri sambuddhathwa jayanthi mandirayen ema thripitaka dharma grantha pradhana purathana saha pariwarthana ha lama bauddha grantha sinhala, ingi්rasi, pransha, jarman ha drawida bhashawen da ema grantha laba gatha hakiyi. 1993 kolambaa kalabhawanedi kolambaa pihiti godage poth madura, samayawardhana aadi boho grantha prakashana samagamwalatada arayum kara grantha pradarshanayak pawathwana ladi.grantha prakashanayange sangamaya samaga sakachcha kara 2000 wasare sita kolambaa bandaranayaka jathyanthara anusmarana sammanthrana shalawedi ema grantha pradarshanaya pawathwima dakwa sanwardhanaya wiya.me wana wita deshiya ha wideshiya grantha prakashana samagam thunsiya panahak pamana me dinawala kolambaadi pawathwena grantha pradarshana ha salpila sandaha sahabhagi we.
